sen.j: 官位は従四位下、検非違使、左衛門大尉、刑部権大輔、駿河国守、遠江国守、陸奥国守。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and he successively filled the posts of Kebiishi (a police and judicial chief), Saemon no daijo (Senior Lieutenant at the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards), Gyobu Gon no taifu (Provisional Senior Assistant Minister of Justice), Suruga-no-kuni-no-kami (the governor of Suruga Province), Totomi no kuni no kami (Governor of Totomi Province) and Mutsu no kuni no kami (the governor of Mutsu Province).

sen.e: He is said to have served the FUJIWARA no Michinaga family as his father had done, filled the post of Zuryo (the head of the provincial governors) and been promoted to Fourth Rank.

sen.e: In the mean time, while a woman kajin (waka poet), Yushi Naishinno-ke no Kii is considered to have been a daughter of Tadashige, she is said to have been a daughter of TAIRA no Tsunekata or of FUJIWARA no Moronaga, which has made it unclear.
